def __init__(self, description: str, status: str = "not done", id_number: int = None):
    self.description = description
    self.status = status
    self.id_number = id_number

import json
import os

def load_todos() -> list[Todo]:
    todos_file = os.path.expanduser("~/.todos.json")
    if not os.path.exists(todos_file):
        return []

    with open(todos_file, "r") as f:
        todos_data = json.load(f)

    return [Todo(**todo) for todo in todos_data]
</>

<completed id="2">
import json
import os

def save_todos(todos: list[Todo]) -> None:
    todos_file = os.path.expanduser("~/.todos.json")
    todos_data = [todo.__dict__ for todo in todos]

    with open(todos_file, "w") as f:
        json.dump(todos_data, f)
</>

<completed id="3">
def add_todo(description):
    todo = Todo(description)
    todos.append(todo)
    save_todos(todos)
</>

<completed id="4">
def remove_todo(id):
    todos[:] = [todo for todo in todos if todo.id_number != id]
    save_todos(todos)
</>

<completed id="5">
def print_todos():
    for todo in todos:
        print(f"{todo.id_number}: {todo.description} ({todo.status})")

import argparse

parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()
subparsers = parser.add_subparsers(dest="command")

add_parser = subparsers.add_parser("add")
add_parser.add_argument("description")

remove_parser = subparsers.add_parser("remove")
remove_parser.add_argument("id", type=int)

list_parser = subparsers.add_parser("list")

args = parser.parse_args()

if args.command == "add":
    add_todo(args.description)
elif args.command == "remove":
    remove_todo(args.id)
elif args.command == "list":
    print_todos()
else:
    parser.print_help()
</>
